snippet: After turning down an earlier offer from the Ravens that he felt was too small, Joe Flacco has done more in one year to solidify his bargaining position than any other N.F.L. free agent.
abstract: Judy Battista On Pro Football column argues that Baltimore Ravens quarterback Joe Flacco, having clinched the Super Bowl MVP, has done more than any other player in a single year to solidify his image and contract bargaining position.
lead_paragraph: After turning down an earlier offer from the Ravens that he felt was too small, Joe Flacco has done more in one year to solidify his bargaining position than any other N.F.L. free agent.

headline.seo: Ravens to Pay for Joe Flacco’s Exquisite Timing
headline.main: A Top-Tier Quarterback Set to Be Paid Like One
headline.print_headline: A Top-Tier Quarterback Set to Be Paid Like One
